resources.string: 3D live wallpaper of sardines that used BOIDS algorithm
The number of sardines that display it is specified.
Please select the number of sardines that display it.
The passing speed that is basic of the sardine is specified.
Please select the passing speed where the sardine swims.
Please choose this so that you change the number of sardine or speed.

Explanation:
 This is 3D live Wallpaper simulating a school of sardines which used BOIDS algorithm.
 
 
 Features:
 1) This simulates "a school of sardines". 2) You can increase the number of sardine to 200 of them.
 	However, this becomes very slow and choppy when you increased them.
 	Please adjust number of sardines by yourself.
 3) You can change the speed that the sardine swims.
 4) Sardine comes there when you touched screen.
 5) You can enable "a school of sardine" function.
 You can disable "a school of sardine" function.
 6) You can change distance from a viewpoint to the center of the aquarium.
 7) There is a viewpoint mode of the sardine. You seem to have become the sardine.
 
 
 Requirement:
 1) After Android2.1.
 2) OpenGL ES 1.0.
 3) Over 3MB Heep memory area.
 
 
 Newly ChangeLog:
 iwashi3d (1.0.16) stable; urgency=low
 
 	* Fixed BUG.
 	Texture failure.
 	on Galaxy NEXUS SC-04D.

 iwashi3d (1.0.13) stable; urgency=low
 
 	* You can increase the number of sardine to greatest 200 of them.
 
 -- Atsushi Konno <konno@qsdn.co.jp> Mon, 01 Aug 2011 11:20:23 +0900
 
 iwashi3d (1.0.12) stable; urgency=low
 
 	* Improved a part of the BOIDS algorithm
 	Because there was concern at transaction speed,
 	I made processing short in a BOIDS part.
 	However, there was not the need by the improvement
 	of the drawing part. thus I did a BOIDS part properly.
 
 	-- Atsushi Konno <konno@qsdn.co.jp> Fri, 29 Jul 2011 09:25:43 +0900
 
 iwashi3d (1.0.11) stable; urgency=low
 
 	* Changed default language
 		- Japanese to English
 
 	-- Atsushi Konno <konno@qsdn.co.jp> Thu, 21 Jul 2011 23:40:04 +0900
 
 iwashi3d (1.0.10) stable; urgency=low
 
 	* Fixed bug
 		- changed slightly when changing the number of
 		sardine movement.
 	* Changed ADS.
 		- To prevent them from pressing the wrong.
